title: An idea for account security
body:
Have you guys ever considered implementing so kind of authentication system as a second layer of account protection?

I mean similar to what Blizzard began using with battle.net authenticators (both physical and mobile.)

Speaking as someone who just (thankfully!) got a perma ban reversed do to my account being compromised and the person using scripts, I would love to see something like this added in to protect your players. We do invest heavily in both time and money into this awesome game and I believe that warrants some additional security options.

This is something I would even pay for if needed.
